dcterms:description: A suite of continuous control tasks designed for evaluating reinforcement learning algorithms. Includes tasks such as acrobot, cartpole, cheetah, hopper, humanoid, manipulator, swimmer, and walker. The tasks are implemented in the MuJoCo physics simulator and provide a benchmark for testing various control policies.
dcterms:title: MuJoCo Control Suite

dcterms:creator: Yuval Tassa

dcterms:description: A set of manipulation tasks designed to evaluate the ability of reinforcement learning agents to perform dexterous tasks. Includes tasks such as catching a falling object, picking up and orienting an object, and rotating an object in-hand. Implemented in the MuJoCo physics simulator with a simulated anthropomorphic hand model.
dcterms:title: Dexterous Manipulation Tasks

dcterms:description: A parkour domain where a robotic walker must navigate obstacles such as gaps, barriers, and platforms. The tasks are implemented in the MuJoCo physics simulator and involve both 2D and 3D navigation challenges.
dcterms:title: Parkour Domain
